snippet.title: Dead Man's Trail - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Pie For Breakfast Studios and Omiya Games present Dead Man's Trail - coming Spring 2017. Dead Man's Trail is a zombie survival travel game in the spirit of Oregon Trail-like games with some modern twists. Players must keep their party of 4 travelers happy and healthy as they try to reach safety. Each party member has their own job that helps along the way - mechanic, paramedic, weapons experts, and others - so losing them to sickness, hunger, or the horde is a significant blow to your journey. 

Players manage their journey and gather items from procedurally generated 3D looting levels. Along with randomized travel events and many options for vehicle and party, it's never the same journey twice!
